    draw() - Method in class ui.MainMenuScreen
    Renders the main menu screen, including: An animated background gradient A semi-transparent stock-themed background image overlay User interface elements with buttons for navigation: Stock Analysis (Graphing) Simulations Exit Program A click-flash overlay effect for visual feedback on mouse clicks This method is called continuously to update the screen visuals.

    drawGraphs(ArrayList<StockData>, PApplet, Rectangle) - Method in class graphing.GraphPlotter
    Draws all stock data graphs and prediction lines on the provided PApplet sketch inside the bounds of graphBox.
    DrawingSurface - Class in ui
    The DrawingSurface class is responsible for rendering the user interface of the application, handling user input, and managing the screen transitions.
    DrawingSurface() - Constructor for class ui.DrawingSurface
    Constructs a new DrawingSurface instance, initializing the screen size, controller, and a list of screens.
    DTBuy(StockData[], String, int) - Static method in class simulation.InvestmentSimulator
    Attempts to buy a specified amount of shares of a stock in day trading mode.
    DTSell(StockData[], String, int) - Static method in class simulation.InvestmentSimulator
    Attempts to sell a specified amount of shares of a stock in day trading mode.
